items.title: What is this design system?
items.content: A comprehensive collection of reusable UI components built with modern web technologies. It includes everything you need to build beautiful, responsive websites.

items.title: How do I customize components?
items.content: Every component accepts props for styling including colors, sizes, spacing, and more. You can easily override default styles to match your brand.

items.title: Is it responsive?
items.content: Yes! All components are built with responsive design in mind and work seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

items.title: What about browser support?
items.content: We support all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. IE11 is not supported.

tabs.label: Overview
tabs.content: Our design system provides a complete set of components for building modern web applications. Each component is carefully crafted with attention to detail and user experience.

tabs.label: Features
tabs.content: Key features include: Responsive design, Accessibility support, Dark mode ready, Customizable themes, TypeScript support, and Comprehensive documentation.

tabs.label: Installation
tabs.content: Install via npm: npm install design-system. Then import components: import { Button, Card } from 'design-system'. Start building amazing interfaces!

tabs.label: Support
tabs.content: Need help? Check our documentation, join our Discord community, or contact support at support@designsystem.com. We're here to help!

props.content: Choose the perfect plan for your needs. All plans include our core features.

items.title: Can I change plans later?
items.content: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any charges.

items.title: What payment methods do you accept?
items.content: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for Enterprise plans.

items.title: Is there a free trial?
items.content: Yes! Professional and Enterprise plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start.

items.title: What happens when I reach my project limit?
items.content: You'll be notified when approaching your limit. You can upgrade your plan or archive old projects to make room for new ones.

items.title: Do you offer refunds?
items.content: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact us for a full refund.

items.title: Can I cancel anytime?
items.content: Absolutely! There are no long-term contracts. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings.

props.title: Still Have Questions?
props.description: Our team is here to help. Contact us for personalized assistance.
